channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Should I Pay Off My Mortgage or Invest? (We Did the Math)
item.description: Pay off your mortgage or invest? If you’re on the path to FIRE, you’ve probably asked yourself this question. Without a mortgage payment, you could put thousands more in your […]

item.title: Payoneer scoops up Skuad, Robinhood’s strong Q2, and X is making progress on payments
item.description: Welcome to TechCrunch Fintech! This week, we’re looking at Payoneer’s $61 million acquisition of Skuad, Robinhood and Dave’s second-quarter results, X’s progress on its payments and more. To get a roundup of TechCrunch’s biggest and most important fintech stories delivered to your inbox every Tuesday at 8:00 a.m. PT, subscribe here. The big story Last […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ‘Deliberate Indifference’: Court Rulings Challenge Extreme Heat Conditions in Prisons
item.description: “If it’s 103 outside, it may be 107 to -8 inside of your cell,” said a man who worked in the fields while imprisoned in Texas.

item.title: Early Symptoms and Signs of Psoriatic Arthritis
item.description: Psoriatic arthritis can occur in up to one-third of individuals with psoriasis. Discover the early signs of this chronic inflammatory arthritis.

item.title: Demand For Section 8 Housing Will Remain High—Here’s Why
item.description: Many Americans struggle to afford housing and will continue to, making this one of the most surefire ways to keep your properties in demand.

item.title: Encord lands new cash to grow its data labeling tools for AI
item.description: Labeling and annotation platforms might not get the attention flashy new generative AI models do. But they’re essential. The data on which many models train must be labeled, or the models wouldn’t be able to interpret that data during the training process. Annotation is a vast undertaking, requiring thousands to millions of annotations for the […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Tim Walz on Criminal Justice: 5 Things to Know
item.description: Where Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Vice President Kamala Harris’ running mate, stands on policing, guns, prison reform and other issues.

item.title: Even If the Fed Cuts Rates, Homes Will Still Be Just as Expensive
item.description: The Fed is expected to cut rates next month, but that won't solve affordability problems anytime soon.

item.title: Singaporean investment app Syfe pulls in $27M to hasten growth in Asia Pacific
item.description: The Asia Pacific region has long been an important market for wealth management firms with the plethora of developing economies and a burgeoning retail investment market. But there’s still a huge market to capture: About 40% to 45% of personal financial assets in the region are held in cash and deposits as of 2023, according […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: They Exposed Police Misconduct. Now They’re Paying a Steep Price.
item.description: Whistleblower laws have advanced in public and private sectors, but protections for police who report illegal or unethical behavior lag far behind.

item.title: The Link Between AFib and Thyroid Disease
From $17K/Year Teacher Salary to Financial Freedom with Repeatable Rentals
item.description: How does a teacher with a LOW salary achieve financial freedom, let alone invest in real estate? Surprisingly, it’s not as hard as you think, and if you repeat the […]

item.title: Twitch rolls out video stories to challenge Instagram
item.description: After launching photo and text stories last year, Twitch is now introducing video stories. Streamers can now film 60-second videos in the Twitch mobile app or upload a video from their camera roll. Twitch sees the new feature as a way for streamers to take viewers with them when they’re on the go and away […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Drawing Attention
item.description: News Inside Issue 17 features the opinions of justice-affected people on Trump’s felonies, and a nonfiction comic about death penalty mitigation.

item.title: Short-Term Rental Demand Returns, So Why Are Hosts Making Less?
item.description: A couple of years ago, everyone was expecting an “Airbnbust,” where short-term rental investments would sit vacant, hosts would be forced to sell, and hotels would take the reigns as […]

item.title: California AI bill SB 1047 aims to prevent AI disasters, but Silicon Valley warns it will cause one
item.description: SB 1047 has drawn the ire of Silicon Valley players large and small, including venture capitalists, big tech trade groups, researchers and startup founders. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: These Private Centers Lack Oversight. Cuyahoga County Judges Send Kids Anyway.
item.description: Courts are increasingly sending children to private youth care centers, spending millions while detention center overcrowding persists.
